sourcesContent:
<template lang="pug">
  .burger(@click="toggle_menu()" aria-label="Open menu")
    .burger__buns
      .burger__bun.bun.bun--top
      .burger__bun.bun.bun--mid
      .burger__bun.bun.bun--bot
</template>

<script>
import toggleSidebar from '@/mixins/toggle_sidebar';

export default {
  name: 'Burger',
  mixins: [toggleSidebar],
};
</script>

<style lang="sass" scoped>

$spacing: 10px
$height: 28px
$width: 36px
$burger_buns: ('top': $Haiti, 'mid': $Jacarta, 'bot': $Twilight)
$bun-height: ( length($burger_buns)*$spacing - $height ) * 2

.burger
  display: none
  position: relative
  padding: 1.5*$spacing $spacing
  height: $height + 3*$spacing
  width: $width + 2*$spacing
  background-color: transparent
  border: none
  cursor: pointer
  transform: scale(1)
  transition: ease 0.001s
  z-index: 1000
  -webkit-touch-callout: none
  user-select: none

  //&:active, &:focus
  //  outline: none

  +breakpoint-max($large)
    display: block

  &__buns
    position: relative
    height: $height
    width: $width

  &__bun
    display: block
    position: absolute
    height: $bun-height
    width: $width
    border-radius: 2px

  @each $burger_bun, $bun_color in $burger_buns
    $i: index($burger_buns, $burger_bun $bun_color) - 1

    .bun--#{$burger_bun}
      top: $i * $spacing
      background-color: $bun_color

  .bun--top
    transform-origin: ($width - $bun-height) 2px
  .bun--bot
    transform-origin: ($width - $bun-height) 2px

.burger
  &.is-opened
    .bun--top
      animation: bun-top-out 0.6s linear normal
      animation-fill-mode: forwards
    .bun--bot
      animation: bun-bot-out 0.6s linear normal
      animation-fill-mode: forwards
    .bun--mid
      animation: burger-fill-out 0.6s linear normal
      animation-fill-mode: forwards
  &.is-closed
    .bun--top
      animation: bun-top-in 0.6s linear normal
      animation-fill-mode: forwards
    .bun--bot
      animation: bun-bot-in 0.6s linear normal
      animation-fill-mode: forwards
    .bun--mid
      animation: burger-fill-in 0.6s linear normal
      animation-fill-mode: forwards

@keyframes bun-top-out
  0%
    transform: rotate(0deg)
  20%
    transform: rotate(15deg)
  80%
    transform: rotate(-60deg)
  100%
    transform: rotate(-45deg)

@keyframes bun-top-in
  0%
    transform: rotate(-45deg)
  20%
    transform: rotate(-60deg)
  80%
    transform: rotate(15deg)
  100%
    transform: rotate(0deg)

@keyframes bun-bot-out
  0%
    transform: rotate(0deg)
  20%
    transform: rotate(-15deg)
  80%
    transform: rotate(60deg)
  100%
    transform: rotate(45deg)

@keyframes bun-bot-in
  0%
    transform: rotate(45deg)
  20%
    transform: rotate(60deg)
  80%
    transform: rotate(-15deg)
  100%
    transform: rotate(0deg)

@keyframes burger-fill-in
  0%
    width: 0
    left: ($width - $bun-height)
  40%
    width: 0
    left: 40px
  80%
    width: ($width - $bun-height)
    left: -6px
  100%
    width: ($width - $bun-height)
    left: 0

@keyframes burger-fill-out
  0%
    width: ($width - $bun-height)
    left: 0
  20%
    width: 42px
    left: -6px
  40%
    width: 0
    left: 40px
  100%
    width: 0
    left: ($width - $bun-height)

</style>
